description: Pascal's "rhombus" (actually a triangle) mod 2, read by rows: each entry is sum modulo 2 of 3 terms above it in previous row and one term above it two rows back.
links: J. Goldwasser et al., The density of ones in Pascal's rhombus, Discrete Math., 204 (1999), 231-236.
Paul K. Stockmeyer, The Pascal Rhombus and the Stealth Configuration, arXiv:1504.04404 [math.CO], 2015.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 26 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jan 30 2001
